parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> Arma 3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the color of item's picture (left) with the given index of the listbox with id idc of the topmost user dialog to the given color. Color is in format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]. Color which consists from only zeros means disable this override. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetPictureColor''' [idc, index, color] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, name]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetPictureColor''' [index, color] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, name]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>[[lbSetPictureColor]] [101, 0, [0, 1, 0, 0.5]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>		  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lbSetPictureColor]] [0, [1, 1, 1, 1]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbSetPictureColorSelected]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]], [[lbSetPicture]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 18, 2015 - 09:55 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
(Arma 3 1.48) To give an image on the right side of a listbox item:
<code>_ctrl lbSetPictureRightColor [_index, [1,1,1,0.7]];</code>
</dd>
